trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access a delegate across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un contratto che possono utilizzare per accedere a un delegato attraverso i limiti di dominio e processo di applicazione.

trans-unit.source: To invoke a delegate, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per richiamare un delegato, utilizzare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to an event or remove a delegate from an event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that is returned by <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un delegato a un evento o rimuovere un delegato da un evento, chiamare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>metodo <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>che viene restituito da <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A>o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass an IRemoteDelegateContract that represents the delegate to the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passare un IRemoteDelegateContract che rappresenta il delegato di `parameters` parametro <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the delegate that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Richiama il delegato da questo <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the delegate parameters.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> </xref> che specifica i parametri del delegato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the return value of the invoked delegate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> che specifica il valore restituito del delegato richiamato.
